item.title: Katie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "When I was a child, adults would tell me not to make things up, warning me of what would happen if I did. As far as I can tell so far, it seems to involve lots of foreign travel and not having to get up too early in the morning." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Katie add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "You save yourself or you remain unsaved." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Katie add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Katie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "Nescire autem quid antequam natus sis acciderit, id est semper esse puerum. (To be ignorant of what occurred before you were born is to remain always a child.)" -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Katie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "Sed nescio quo modo nihil tam absurde dici potest quod non dicatur ab aliquo philosphorum. (There is nothing so absurd but some philosopher has said it.)" -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Katie add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Never say you know the last word about any human heart." -- Henry James

item.title: Katie add a quote by Moli
item.description: "Writing is like prostitution. First you do it for love, and then for a few close friends, and then for money." -- Moli

item.title: Katie add a quote by Molière (Jean-Baptiste Poquelin)
item.description: "We die only once, and for such a long time." -- Molière (Jean-Baptiste Poquelin)

item.title: Katie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Katie add a quote by Marquis de Sade
item.description: "Conversation, like certain portions of the anatomy, always runs more smoothly when lubricated." -- Marquis de Sade

item.title: Katie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Katie add a quote by Gwendolyn Brooks
item.description: "Live not for Battles Won. Live not for The-End-of-the-Song. Live in the along." -- Gwendolyn Brooks
